description: These slow cooker meatballs make a rich, flavourful ragu to enjoy with pasta, as a sub or simply as is.
name: Meatball Ragu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to serve, preheat grill to high. Transfer meatballs and sauce to a large heatproof dish. Scatter with mozzarella and parmesan. Grill for 6 minutes or until golden. Scatter with extra basil and serve.
